SELECT * FROM ( SELECT AS_NO AS ASNO, REG_TIMESTAMP AS CREATEDATE, COMP_NAME AS COMPNAME, TID_MODEL_NAME TIDMODELNAME, CASE WHEN TERMINAL_ID IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TERMINAL_ID END AS TERMINALID, CASE WHEN SERIAL_NO IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE SERIAL_NO END AS SERIALNO, CASE WHEN CID IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE CID END AS CID, CASE WHEN SAM_FLAG IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE SAM_FLAG END AS SAMFLAG, CASE WHEN TE.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TE.NAME END AS TRBNAME, CASE WHEN TE2.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TE2.NAME END AS RTNAME, CASE WHEN TE3.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TE3.NAME END AS ATNAME, CASE WHEN TR.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TR.NAME END AS MBRVNAME, CASE WHEN TR2.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TR2.NAME END AS SBRVNAME, CASE WHEN TR3.NAME IS NULL THEN '-' ELSE TR3.NAME END AS ICRVNAME FROM TB_AS_LIST LIST LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANY COMP ON LIST.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_TERMINAL_MODEL TM ON LIST.TID_SEQ = TM.TID_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE ON LIST.TRB_SEQ = TE.SEQ AND TE.T_TYPE = 'T' LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE2 ON LIST.RT_SEQ = TE2.SEQ AND TE2.T_TYPE = 'R' LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE3 ON LIST.AT_SEQ = TE3.SEQ AND TE3.T_TYPE = 'A' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR ON LIST.MAINBOARD_RV_SEQ = TR.SEQ AND TR.R_TYPE = 'MN' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR2 ON LIST.SUBBOARD_RV_SEQ = TR2.SEQ AND TR2.R_TYPE = 'SB' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR3 ON LIST.IC_RV_SEQ = TR3.SEQ AND TR3.R_TYPE = 'IC' WHERE 1 = 1
AND ${searchType} LIKE '%'|| #{searchValue} ||'%'
AND SUPPORT_TYPE = 'R' ) A ORDER BY TRBNAME ASC, RTNAME ASC, ATNAME ASC, MBRVNAME ASC, SBRVNAME ASC, ICRVNAME ASC

SELECT AS_BOARD_SEQ AS SEQ, AS_NO AS ASNO, PTN_WRITER AS PTNWRITER, LIST.COMP_SEQ AS COMPSEQ, COMP_NAME || '(' || BUSINESS_NO || ')' AS COMPNAME, SERIAL_NO AS SERIALNO, CID AS CID, SAM_FLAG AS SAMFLAG, LIST.TID_SEQ AS TIDSEQ, TM.TID_MODEL_NAME AS TIDMODELNAME, TERMINAL_ID AS TERMINALID, LIST.TRB_SEQ AS TRBSEQ, TE.NAME AS TRBNAME, LIST.RT_SEQ AS RTSEQ, TE2.NAME AS RTNAME, LIST.AT_SEQ AS ATSEQ, TE3.NAME AS ATNAME, MAINBOARD_RV_SEQ AS MBRVSEQ, TR.NAME AS MBRVNAME, SUBBOARD_RV_SEQ AS SBRVSEQ, TR2.NAME AS SBRVNAME, IC_RV_SEQ AS ICRVSEQ, TR3.NAME AS ICRVNAME, PTN_COMMENT AS PTNCOMMENT, REG_TIMESTAMP AS CREATEDATE, MODIFY_TIMESTAMP AS MODIFYDATE FROM TB_AS_LIST LIST LEFT JOIN TB_COMPANY COMP ON LIST.COMP_SEQ = COMP.COMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_TERMINAL_MODEL TM ON LIST.TID_SEQ = TM.TID_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE ON LIST.TRB_SEQ = TE.SEQ AND TE.T_TYPE = 'T' LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE2 ON LIST.RT_SEQ = TE2.SEQ AND TE2.T_TYPE = 'R' LEFT JOIN TB_ERROR TE3 ON LIST.AT_SEQ = TE3.SEQ AND TE3.T_TYPE = 'A' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR ON LIST.MAINBOARD_RV_SEQ = TR.SEQ AND TR.R_TYPE = 'MN' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR2 ON LIST.SUBBOARD_RV_SEQ = TR2.SEQ AND TR2.R_TYPE = 'SB' LEFT JOIN TB_REVISION TR3 ON LIST.IC_RV_SEQ = TR3.SEQ AND TR3.R_TYPE = 'IC' WHERE AS_NO = #{asNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_AS_LIST (AS_BOARD_SEQ, AS_NO, PTN_WRITER, COMP_SEQ, CTM_NAME, CTM_PHONE, CTM_PLACE_POST_CODE, CTM_PLACE_ADDRESS1, CTM_PLACE_ADDRESS2, CTM_PLACE_NAME, CTM_CHARGE, TERMINAL_ID, VM_SEQ, TRB_SEQ, REPAIR_COST, PTN_COMMENT, PROGRESS_STATUS, READ_COUNT, PTN_IP, GROUP_NUM, SEQUENCE_NUM, SEQUENCE_LEVEL, REG_TIMESTAMP, RT_SEQ, AT_SEQ, MODIFY_USER, TID_SEQ, PTN_CP_DATE, PTN_MEMO, CID, SERIAL_NO, SAM_FLAG, SUPPORT_TYPE, MAINBOARD_RV_SEQ, SUBBOARD_RV_SEQ, IC_RV_SEQ) VALUES (NEXTVAL('TB_AS_LIST_SEQ'), #{asNo}, #{ptnWriter}, #{compSeq}, #{compName}, '', '', '', '', '', '', #{terminalId}, #{vmSeq}, #{trbSeq}, 0, #{ptnComment}, '1', 0, '', 0, 0, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul', #{rtSeq}, #{atSeq}, #{modifyUser}, #{tidSeq}, #{ptnCpDate}, #{ptnMemo}, #{cid}, #{serialNo}, #{samFlag}, 'R', #{mbRvSeq}, #{sbRvSeq}, #{icRvSeq})
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_AS_LIST SET COMP_SEQ = #{as.compSeq}, CTM_NAME = #{as.compName}, TERMINAL_ID = #{as.terminalId}, TRB_SEQ = #{as.trbSeq}, PTN_COMMENT = #{as.ptnComment}, MODIFY_TIMESTAMP = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AT TIME ZONE 'Asia/Seoul', RT_SEQ = #{as.rtSeq}, AT_SEQ = #{as.atSeq}, MODIFY_USER = #{as.modifyUser}, TID_SEQ = #{as.tidSeq}, CID = #{as.cid}, SERIAL_NO = #{as.serialNo}, SAM_FLAG = #{as.samFlag}, MAINBOARD_RV_SEQ = #{as.mbRvSeq}, SUBBOARD_RV_SEQ = #{as.sbRvSeq}, IC_RV_SEQ = #{as.icRvSeq} WHERE AS_NO = #{asNo}
